Text.Page: Speak with Linkia in the village of Kanstria.
Hey! I don't recognize you. Did you come from Kaiator?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"No, but I'm here to help."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

We've been cut off for a while. When the argons hit our flight platform, it isolated us more than we'd expected.

Still, if you're here, they didn't forget about us. Thank you.
